page.title: 07PLEASUREWOOD HILLS,LOWESTOFT
page.content: The idea for Pleasurewood Hills American Theme Park came from America. The owners name is Joe Larter and the managers name is Chris Barnard.It is open every week and Bank Holidays from May 18th at 10:00am.Left luggage lockers,free loan cameras and facilities for the disabled are all available.Animals(except guide dogs) are not allowed in the park.The price for all classes is 3 pounds 50 pence. Pleasurewood Hills is located just off the A12 between Great Yarmouth & Lowestoft.At Pleasurewood Hills there are a lot of exciting rides and shows, such as...The Pirate Boat,The Troika, The Water Fantasy Ride and The Parrot Show.Food and refreshments are also available.In fact Pleasurewood Hills provides a great day out for all the family.
